title: Warhammer 40,000: Dawn of War 3 – v4.0.0.16278 + PreOrder Bonus
body:
Warhammer 40,000: Dawn of War 3 – v4.0.0.16278 + PreOrder Bonus


Genres/Tags: Strategy, RTS, Isometric, 3D
Companies: Relic Entertainment / Sega
Languages: RUS/ENG/MULTI13
Original Size: 28.6 GB
Repack Size: 14.5 GB

 
 

Download Mirrors

  • 1337x / KAT [magnet] [.torrent file only]
  • RuTor [magnet]
  • FreeTorrents
  • Tapochek.net [magnet]
  • Filehoster: MultiUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable) [Use JDownloader2]
  • Filehoster: 3 hosters (Uploaded by Susch, interchangeable, NOT compatible with MultiUpload mirrors) [Use JDownloader2]

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on Dawn.of.War.III.V4.0.0.16278.Steam.Rip release: 28.6 GB
  • Warhammer.40000.Dawn.of.War.III.v.4.0.0.16278.Crack.by.BALDMAN.and.Voksi applied
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 28.6 to 14.5 GB)
  • Installation takes: ~15 minutes on 8-cores CPU; ~20 minutes on 4-cores CPU; ~35 minutes on 2-cores CPU
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: 29 GB
  • Repack uses pZlib library by Razor12911
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack
  • ATTENTION! On first launch when you see “Please wait” string, exit the game via escape menu, then re-run it
  • Check “_Fix” folder for “Please wait” fix in case installer couldn’t copy necessary files for you

Game Description

Step into a brutal battle between three warring factions

In Dawn of War III you will have no choice but to face your foes when a catastrophic weapon is found on the mysterious world of Acheron.

With war raging and the planet under siege by the armies of greedy Ork warlord Gorgutz, ambitious Eldar seer Macha, and mighty Space Marine commander Gabriel Angelos, supremacy must ultimately be suspended for survival.
